channel.title: fzf on Math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in fzf on Math2001's blog

item.title: Jump to function definition in vim
item.description: One of the features I miss from Sublime Text is the Goto Anything. In vim, by default, you have :e **/bit and then tab, and it gets annoying pretty quickly. Thankfully, there’s fzf (with fzf.vim). But although it provides a fairly long list of commands, it doesn’t allow us to jump to function definitions (which is one of the main function of the Goto Anything). fzf for the win There’s no question, fzf as done a really good job at being easily extensible.
